name: Nightmares from the Deep 3: Davy Jones

game.exe: drive_c/Program Files/Artifex Mundi/Nightmares from the Deep - Davy Jones - Collectors Edition (EN)/NightmaresFromTheDeep_DavyJones_CE.exe

content:
files:
- file1: N/A:Please select the Groupees installer
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/Artifex Mundi/Nightmares from the Deep - Davy Jones -
    Collectors Edition (EN)/NightmaresFromTheDeep_DavyJones_CE.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    args: /sp- /silent /norestart
    executable: $file1
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
